data.text:
Bollywood superstar, Amitabh Bachchan is famous for portraying remarkable roles on the silver screen. The entire nation is madly in love with him. While his professional life is filled with remarkable milestones, his personal life is no different. Recently, we stumbled upon an unseen picture of Amitabh Bachchan with his family, and it exudes royalty!

Recommend Read: Rekha's Unlucky Tale Of Love, An Affair With Amitabh Bachchan, A Broken Marriage And Husband's Death

Amitabh Bachchan has seen superstardom. He has been ruling over the box office for many years and continues to do so. However, he loves his family the most. And his Instagram feeds, and his blog is proof of the same. The superstar often shares beautiful unseen pictures of his family for his fans.

For few days, there is an adorable picture of the Bachchans trending on the internet. In the picture, we can see Amitabh Bachchan posing with his wife, Jaya Bachchan. We also spotted Abhishek Bachchan and Shweta Bachchan in the photo, looking super adorable.

Also Read: Amitabh Bachchan And Jaya Bachchan's 100 Crore Worth Home, Jalsa Exudes Royalty, Take An Inside Tour

Check it out below:

When twinning was an alienated thing, Amitabh's family was seen twinning in the picture in question. While Amitabh and Abhishek had donned cream-coloured ethnic ensembles, Jaya and Shweta looked adorable in orange-coloured traditional clothes.

Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's vacation pictures still give couple goals

For those who don't know, Amitabh Bachchan and Jaya Bachchan had tied the knot on June 3, 1973. Their love story started when Jaya first saw the six-foot-tall, Amitabh at Pune Film Institute. And soon, their paths had crossed again on the sets of their film, Guddi (1971), wherein Jaya had felt the first brush of love. And rest, as we say, is history!

On the work front, Amitabh Bachchan is going to be seen in Chehre, MayDay, Jhund!
